actionConfiguration.body:
with base_chapters as (select base_chapter_tag as base_chapter_tag_list from content.chapter_dependance 
					  where chapter_tag = {{chap.selectedOptionValue}}) 

select qp.lb_question_tag, test_id, test_name as question_used_in from (select lb_question_tag, split_part(lb_question_tag, ' - ', 1) as base_chapter_tag from content.ly_question_pool) qp
inner join base_chapters as bc
on qp.base_chapter_tag = any(bc.base_chapter_tag_list)
left join (
	select * from content.ly_question_details
	where test_id = any(array(select test_id from public.course_test_track
		  where chapter_tag ={{chap.selectedOptionValue}}  and section_id = (select section_id from public.course_test_track as ctt  where ctt.test_id = {{test_name.selectedOptionValue}})))) as qd 
on qp.lb_question_tag = qd.lb_question_tag 
where test_id = {{test_name.selectedOptionValue}}

order by qp.base_chapter_tag, split_part(qp.lb_question_tag, ' - Q', 2)::int
